subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The ESPN analyst and former N.H.L. forward Matthew Barnaby was ordered to complete 500 hours of community service in order to have charges dropped stemming from an argument he had with his estranged wife.
snippet: The ESPN analyst and former N.H.L. forward Matthew Barnaby was ordered to complete 500 hours of community service in order to have charges dropped stemming from an argument he had with his estranged wife.
